评论概述: Way to small! Don't feel bad
评论详情: Don't be fooled, especially my curvy people. The size chart if you go by their xl, 2x, 3x etc. is way off. I wear a 2x normally, I fell in love with this but didnt have a tape measure. Amazon recommended a 3x but I decided to order a 6x thinking if its too big I would just tighten it. This corset was so small it was awful, they really need to fix the size chart. If you see the picture of my hand on it you'll think "thats a 6x??" It fit my 12 year old. If I didnt absolutely love the design I would have returned it. Instead I went and got more ribbon to open up the back and I cut off the back panel piece. I had to stretch it as far as possible. I would say their "6x" is more like a medium or large. Do not go by their letter sizes..measure yourself before you order it. I do love the look of this corset  a lot and got so many compliments.

Save yourself the trouble and go with another brand. Now imnout the price of two corsets that don't fit. They would probably fit a medium.sized person at max

Understand, I'm kind of a large gal. My daughters and I are going to a Renaissance fair in a couple of weeks and I wanted something unique (for me) to wear. I have never found a corset that actually fit right. They're usually too big or too small. This one required some creative "sucking in" but once zipped it was tightened down until the spirits of my ancestors were slipping out of my pores. Honestly I looked like I had a waist and I haven't seen that thing in decades. I think I'll wear it to sleep in for a while, see if maybe I can trick my body into thinking that's how it's built. Nevermind, I like breathing. Truly it's a comfortable garment. I do need something to check that back fat roll that looms over the top though. I wish they made them where they came up the back higher, with bones to keep it from folding down (I have some pretty rebellious back fat). I'm not sure how that would work, but if I was the kind of masochist who would subject my girth to a corset every day, I'd wear it just to smooth the under-blubber. Mind you I'm not a cow, but there are decisions I would change (cheesecake and gummy bears). Definitely worth the price. Five gold stars for y'all as it held together when my husband put his foot on my back and snugged that booger on down.

评论概述: If you are extra blessed up top, be mindful of the zipper.
评论详情: I personally am plus size, I ordered a 6x, as it matched my measurements pretty well. That being said, I also do wear a 46K bra, so when I say extra-blessed, I do mean that lol. The boning is plastic, and so it’s quite flexible but it does commit to a shape after not very long if you have a dramatic difference between your waist and bust. The zipper also has its work cut out for it, to be fair, but mine broke after the sixth time zipping it up. For a full figure, if you want to preserve this garment, I would recommend wearing it more as a top layer for a better quality supportive garment beneath it because while it is very cute, it’s not supportive at all lol. It was soft, and very comfortable, I wish I could have gotten more use out of it.

I've been an Amazon customer for over 10 years, and this is the first time I was so impressed with the purchase that I felt compelled to write a review. This Item is a "MUST BUY" if you are looking for a sexy with a touch of goth look. It is very flattering, and the quality is superb considering the price. I wore it to a rock concert and received so many compliments that I felt like a rockstar. I am 5.4, 125lb, 34C - 34D. I bought a size small, and it had a 3" - 4" gap at the top when it was fully laced up. I folded the modesty panel inside the corset, and I liked the way it looked with a little skin showing, but if you are looking for a classic corset look, you might want to go one size bigger. Keep in mind that it has NO stretch to it, and it is very unlikely it will shrink after washing.

评论概述: Fits great. Good quality. I love it.
Looks and feels AMAZING! Could've Gone Smaller
评论详情: Everything in the description is perfect! It is well-made, boning is stiff and supportive, feels so soft and durable.  I found the company that makes this and compared their sizing chart to what is shown here. It was the same. There is a bit of an issue with that, though.  Both charts say to refer to the hip size only. To fit a size 35 waist, we went with 5X.  Bust size is 40 C, waist is 35, hips are 37.  We could have gone to a 3X or 4X, to be honest, but it fits because of the laces.  The cup size of this corset is a bit big for a C, even completely tied at the back, so I think a 4X would have been better for the cup. I think if we went with 3X, it still would have fit but would have had wider spacing between laces in the back and a firm hold at the chest.  I'm tempted to order two more in 4X and 3X just to compare, but I don't have the money for that at the moment. For now, 5X really does work if you're okay with some space at the top. The breasts bounce but the cups do not slag! The boning holds very well. It's very comfortable, too!
